name: Ball Rush: Unlimited
description:
Dive in the world of Ball Rush: Unlimited, a game that will test your skills every moment!

The objective of the game is simple, get as far as possible and get the best score, but don't be fooled by appearances, your skills will be tested to the limit.

- Multiple choices to overcome each obstacle!

- Colorful graphics in a minimalist style!

- Collect as many coins as you can!

- Moments of quick stunts!

- Be quickly and reach the top!

- Different colored balls, collect them all!

Controls:

A - Moves left.

D - Move right.

Escape - Pause the game

Platforms: Windows, Linux and Android.

Language: English, Portuguese and Spanish. 

Follow Us: Instagram | Youtube |  Facebook
